Home » 36P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 4 Vipākattika » 4.1 Paṭiccavāra » 4.1.2 Paccayapaccanīya » 4.1.2.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Naārammaṇa
Vipākattika
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayapaccanīya
Vibhaṅgavāra
Naārammaṇa
27.
2100Vipākaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—  vipāke khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ; paṭisandhikkhaṇe vipāke khandhe paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṃ, khandhe paṭicca vatthu. (1)
28.
2101Vipākadhammadhammaṃ paṭicca nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—  vipākadhammadhamme khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. (1)
29.
2102Nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṃ paṭicca nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—  nevavipākanavipākadhammadhamme khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭicca tayo mahābhūtā…pe…  mahābhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ kaṭattārūpaṃ upādārūpaṃ; bāhiraṃ…  āhārasamuṭṭhānaṃ…  utusamuṭṭhānaṃ…  asaññasattānaṃ ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭicca tayo mahābhūtā…  mahābhūte paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṃ upādārūpaṃ. (1)
30.
2103Vipākañca nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—  vipāke khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ; paṭisandhikkhaṇe vipāke khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṃ. (1)
31.
2104Vipākadhammadhammañca nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—  vipākadhammadhamme khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. (1)
